summary: Ahoy, matey! Your favorite Playmobil toys have come to life for the very first time, in an all-new swashbuckling adventure and you're invited to join them!
cast: Ashleigh Ball|Kathleen Barr|Don Breithaupt|Trevor Devall|Brian Drummond|Kipp Lennon|Scott McNeil|Tracey Moore|Michele Moreno|Jan Rabson|French Tickner|Lee Tockar|Adam Vanderburgh|Anthony Vanderburgh|Sam Vincent|Madison Wackerman|Mallory Wackerman|Caitlin Williams
director: Director: Alexander E. Sokoloff (as Alexander Sokoloff)
title: Playmobil: The Secret of Pirate Island
